mapper.select: select table_name tableName, engine, table_comment tableComment, create_time createTime from information_schema.tables where table_name = #{tableName}

select column_name columnName, data_type dataType, column_type columnType, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH columnSize, IFNULL(column_default,'NULL') columnDefault, column_comment columnComment, column_key columnKey, extra, IS_NULLABLE nullAble from information_schema.columns where table_name = #{tableName} order by ordinal_position

SELECT t.currentSchema, t.tableSchema, t.tableName, t.engine, t.tableComment, t.createTime FROM ( SELECT (SELECT DATABASE()) currentSchema, table_schema tableSchema, concat(table_schema,'.',table_name) tableName, engine, table_comment tableComment, create_time createTime FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE table_schema NOT IN ( 'information_schema', 'performance_schema', 'mysql', 'sys' ) AND table_name NOT IN ('flyway_schema_history') ) t WHERE (t.currentSchema IS NULL OR t.tableSchema = (SELECT DATABASE()))
and t.tableName like concat('%', #{tableName}, '%')
order by t.createTime desc
limit #{offset}, #{limit}
